    To use dripper:

    Preparation:


    1 Load data from CSVs into get_data tables
    2 Flush drippers
    3 Load drippers from get_data tables
    4 Flush get_data tables

    To Run:


    1 Reset get_data tables and start times
    2 Run dripper

    To Stop:


    1 STOP
